validation_rules.description: "type" must be one of events, object-types, layouts, world-instances, event-sheets, conditions, actions.
"items" must be an array with at least one entry.
Actions referencing behaviors must set behaviorType using display name (see behavior-names.md).
All string parameters requiring quotes use nested format (e.g., "\"Text\"").
Variables declare type, initialValue, and comment fields.
Object/layout payloads reuse shared imageData indexes instead of duplicating blobs.
Response includes variables/assets/mapping manifests covering every referenced symbol.
scripts/validate_output.py executed; include status + warnings in the reply.
Final reply states paste location + manual verification step + assumptions/clarifications.
